Name: Brood
About the game: Immerse into a mythical meadow full of unrevealed secrets as you play as a fox. This open-world game lets you emerge into what would be like to live as a forest animal. The player has to figure out on his/her own where is this strange place is and why the fox was destined to be here. The game is in early access stage and not all features are implemented at the moment. Please, read Early Access section. -responsive character animations -well thought out maps -constant updates throughout the Early Access state -This current build is the first playable mode we have, we are very eager to make updates as regularly as possible please consider this when buying and rating our product.-
